text: Rabbi is the first album by Rabbi Shergill. It was released in 2004 by Phat Phish Records. The album was an instant hit. It was played on Indian radio. At first, only 10,000 copies were made for sale. The album went on to sell over 100,000 copies.Scale model All of the songs on the album were composed by Rabbi Shergill. ==Track listing== # "Bulla Ki Jana" - 5:16 # "Tere Bin" - 5:20 # "Heer" - 5:25 # "Ishtihar" - 6:32 # "Totia Manmotia" - 4:36 # "Ajj Nachna" - 4:07 # "Gill 'Te Guitar" - 4:34 # "Ek Geet Hijar Da" - 4:44 # "Jugni" - 4:35 ==References== Category:2004 albums
title: Rabbi (album)
